subscription.subject: %event_title% - subscription successful
subscription.body_txt:
Hello %attendant_name%,

You have been successfully subscribed to this event.

Event Details:

Title: %event_title%

Event url: %public_url%

Venue: %location%

Price: %price% %currency%

Date: %start_date% - %end_date%

Thank you for your support.

If you want to unsubscribe click this link %unsubscribe_link%

Best regards,

%company_name%
